name: TrustMe
0:
”Alexa, open Trust Me”
”Alexa, start Trust Me”
”Alexa, launch Trust Me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trust me
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In this skill alexa will say sentences and the user will have to say if they are true or false. One point is earned for each correct answer. At the end of the game the final score will be assigned.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.
